relevance_explanation: All branches and tool calls irrelevant to this customer were correctly removed. The routine accounts for the customer having more than 30,000 loyalty points, the booking allowing cancellations, and the customer purchasing a refundable ticket. The routine also properly skips the credit option and goes directly to refund because the ticket is refundable.
completeness_explanation: All required logic was preserved. No steps were missed. All tool calls are present and accounted for based on the customer data.
